DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate exact role Acetylcysteine ( Mucomyst ) alter creatinine clearance . Prior study show protective effect Acetylcysteine contrast-induced renal dysfunction . In study , Acetylcysteine lower incidence serum creatinine elevation administration radiographic contrast agent . Not increase serum creatinine prevent , study also demonstrate significant increase creatinine clearance administration agent . These prior study evaluate increase creatinine clearance indeed protective benefit Acetylcysteine preserving GFR versus simply increase proximal tubular creatinine secretion without actually affect GFR . We propose experiment help support hypothesis Acetylcysteine increase creatinine clearance via increase proximal tubular secretion creatinine .
